meanings.definition: A person or thing that assembles.
meanings.sent1: The toy assembler put together all the parts of the robot.
meanings.sent2: The furniture assembler quickly built the new desk.
meanings.sent3: The cake assembler carefully stacked each layer to create a delicious masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle assembler effortlessly connected all the pieces to reveal the complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The car assembler meticulously joined each component to form the finished vehicle.

meanings.definition: A computer program that translates assembly language into machine code.
meanings.sent1: The software assembler converted the code into a language the computer could understand.
meanings.sent2: The program assembler efficiently processed the instructions to generate executable files.
meanings.sent3: The game assembler humorously translated the commands into a secret language only gamers could decipher.
meanings.sent4: The code assembler magically transformed the complex script into a streamlined program.
meanings.sent5: The language assembler skillfully converted the text into a series of binary digits.
